ModMetaData.name: Death Weapon 死神之刃
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
死神之刃模组的主要目标是斩断不死。本模组提供的武器效果只有一个：直接击杀受到攻击的单位。在手工加工点中使用一块钢铁就可以制作，无科技需求。
This mod, Death Weapon, aims to cut off the undead. The only effect of the weapon provided by this mod is to directly kill the attacked unit. You can make the death weapons at the crafting spot, no tech requirements.
